Info.Text: Receive all keys from the customer
Unlearned keys will no longer work
To prevent the BCM from entering into CAN communications sleep mode, turn Hazard Switch ON
After performing the registration process, always verify the operation of all keys

Action.Text: Check Ignition is on, apply brake, and press Next!
You have selected to perform a key relearn.

Info.Text: Please turn Ignition on with key, which should be learned, and wait 5 seconds
Check that security indicator on dash blinks 5 times
Remove ingition key and wait 3 seconds
You can Learn up to 5 keys repeating bullets 2 through 4
After Key Registeration Process, the system returns to key registration mode. It is necessary to end operation according to the following procedure.
Inserted registered ignition key and turn to the ON position
Turn ignition key off, remove ignition key, and wait 10 seconds
Verify that the security indicator blinks at intervals of approximately 3 seconds
Check that each registered key can start the engine.
